{{Infobox newspaper | name = San Francisco Bay Times | image = | caption = | type = [[Weekly newspaper]] | format = | foundation = 1979 | ceased publication = | price = free | owners = | publisher = Betty Sullivan[http://www.sfbaytimes.com/?section_id=40&sec=contact&generic_id=1] | editor = Betty Sullivan | language = English | circulation = | headquarters = [[San Francisco, California|San Francisco]]
and [[Oakland, California]] | ISSN = | website = [http://www.sfbaytimes.com/ www.SFBayTimes.com] }} The '''''San Francisco Bay Times''''' is a free weekly [[LGBT]] newspaper in [[San Francisco]], [[California]] that started as ''Coming Up!'' in October 1979. ''Coming Up!'' was billed as "the gay lesbian newspaper and calendar of events for the Bay Area."[http://www.laganz.org.nz/serials/cap-cut.html "Lesbian and Gay Archives of New Zealand - Serials Holdings List"] Retrieved on 2007-06-08.[http://books.google.com/books?id=FnGGvT3-NfMC&pg=PA29&lpg=PA29&dq=%22san+francisco+bay+times%22&source=bl&ots=fcqp-8eh0-&sig=4BB5C7rhGxVqUYK9zTbWQuWtfuY&hl=en&sa=X&ei=erAxUIHdFsyBqQH5moCgDQ&ved=0CFwQ6AEwCA#v=onepage&q=%22san%20francisco%20bay%20times%22&f=false] In 1988, ''Coming Up!'' changed its name to ''San Francisco Bay Times''.[http://www.sfgate.com/news/article/Roland-Schembari-Co-Founder-of-S-F-Bay-Times-2773437.php ''San Francisco Chronicle'' obituary of founder Roland Schembari (February 24, 2000)] In June 2011, longtime publisher Kim Corsaro stepped down, with Betty Sullivan of LGBT listserve group Betty's List, and her partner Jennifer Viegas, taking over management of the paper.[http://www.ebar.com/news/article.php?sec=news&article=5910 Cynthia Laird, ''Bay Area Reporter'' (August 4, 2011)] The ''Bay Times'' provides news and information of interest to the gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgendered community in the San Francisco Bay Area. It includes book and music reviews, lists upcoming events in the area in addition to art, entertainment and social issues of interest to readers including news on health and politics.{{Citation needed|date=September 2010}} ==See also== *''[[Bay Area Reporter]]'' *''[[San Francisco Sentinel]]'' == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * {{official website|http://www.sfbaytimes.com/}} * [http://www.worldcat.org/title/san-francisco-bay-times/oclc/42691769&referer=brief_results ''San Francisco Bay Times'' at Worldcat.org] {{LGBT in California}} [[Category:Alternative weekly newspapers published in the United States]] [[Category:LGBT culture in the San Francisco Bay Area]] [[Category:LGBT-related newspapers in the United States]] [[Category:Newspapers published in the San Francisco Bay Area]] [[Category:Weekly newspapers published in the United States]] [[Category:Publications established in 1979]] {{LGBT-newspaper-stub}} {{California-newspaper-stub}}
